name: PrescribedMedicationsEducation
title: Prescribed Medications Education
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent procedures used to represent patients who receive prescribed medications education.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Communication. The intent of this data element is to identify patients who receive education on the medications they were prescribed to take.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with SNOMED CT codes representing prescribed medications education.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Medication prescription education, guidance and counseling (procedure)

contains.display: Medication prescription education, guidance and counseling (procedure)
